bite.description: A bite using the natural strength of their maw.

fire blast.description: This spell causes an explosion targeting one enemy.

karate kick.description: Hits an enemy using their martial habilities.

sword slash.description: Swims arround their heavy sword, damaging all the enemies.

clubbing.description: Swims arround their heavy club, damaging all the enemies.

web trap.description: Coves the enemy field with a spider web that deals damage at the end of the turn.

aura shock.description: Meditates to free an energy blow at the end of the turn that will hit all the enemies.

quick stroke.description: Attacks quickly with their weapon; it's not very powerfull but it will hit early in the turn.

healing spell.description: The user can choose to heal themself or any of their allies.

frozen wind.description: A frosty spell that hits all the enemies.

energy draining.description: Absorbs their enemy energy, recovering a bit of health points.

defensive knock.description: Does not hit hard, but adopts a defensive position that gives them a few health points.
